name: Fashione v1
description:
This is a 3D interactive experience where I showcase some of the digital clothing I have created inspired by 2D images. 

In this ''game'' I am also demonstrating what I would like other game developers to keep in mind for their own games. Switching from third-person to first-person is a special feature that I love to see in games. And being able to change the appearance of the game in real time whenever you like is something I really value. (Something like the eagle vision in Assasins Creed)

If you are a digital creator I'm sure you will find something that inspires you in this experience.

Controls: 

Navigate using WASD or the arrows, 

Spacebar to jump. 

Press P to toggle the pause menu on/off

Press C to switch from third-person to first-person and vice versa

Press E to change the visual effects in game.
